attributes.action: Make November 11th a permanent yearly bank holiday
attributes.additional_details:
We would like the government to initiate an extra bank holiday on 11th November to allow a proper day to commemorate armistice. Other European countries such as Belgium shut down all shops and businesses to allow the commemorations to be carried out in a proper fashion.
However the U.K as the country many of the fallen were from, does not have this marked as a public holiday as it should be and we would like this changed to become a permanent bank holiday regardless of the day of the week it falls.
